issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Compiling an Android app with SDK 7.0.1.GA shows a lot of warnings in the log about XML nodes that are overwritten:
{code}
...
[DEBUG] Merging /tmp/118014-16526-zphxif.2vskj/res/values-port/values-port.xml => /build/android/res/values-port/values-port.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node abc_action_bar_embed_tabs in file /build/android/res/values-port/values-port.xml
[DEBUG] Merging /tmp/118014-16526-zphxif.2vskj/res/values-pt/values-pt.xml => /build/android/res/values-pt/values-pt.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node status_bar_notification_info_overflow in file /build/android/res/values-pt/values-pt.xml

with ti.map it is even more (short snipped):
{code}
...
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_enable_button in file /build/android/res/values/values.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_enable_text in file /build/android/res/values/values.xml

[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_signin_button_text in file /build/android/res/values/values.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_signin_button_text_long in file /build/android/res/values/values.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node LoadingImageView in file /build/android/res/values/values.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_enable_button in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_enable_text in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_enable_title in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_install_button in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_install_title in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_notification_ticker in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_unsupported_text in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml

[WARN]  Overwriting XML node common_google_play_services_updating_text in file /build/android/res/values-af/values-af.xml
...
{code}

Since they are not related to my code they should be ignored. 

Source:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/d877ab08e2bba1950d294601b3249e6d6ec79f5f/android/cli/lib/base-builder.js#L52
fields.summary: Android: Compile log contains too many XML node warnings

comments.body: Hello [~michael], Thanks for sharing with us. Please provide a full sample test code that regenerates the issue. Better to provide a sample app as an attachment here. We will test the issue in our environment. Also, provide the SDK and CLI version you are testing on.
[~lchoudhary] can you close this old issue please? It's not an issue anymore since it is using gradle now and the part that code part is removed from the repository.
